*Macro:*

`10Y 4.03% (-1.13% 5d) falling`
`Au/Ag ratio: 58.9 (compressed)`
`Gold: $5,184  FOMC: 20d`

Short-term oversold on all timeframes (15m RSI 29.3, below lower BB) -- bounce setup possible toward $88.20 then $89.13. But medium-term trend damage is real: dropped from $90.55 entry, 15m MACD deeply negative (-0.226). DXY firming above SMA20 is a headwind. Falling 10Y yields provide some support. Gold/silver ratio at 58.9 remains historically compressed -- silver has been outperforming gold. US markets open in ~6.5h. Watch $87.47 support (1h BB lower) -- if broken, next support around $86.50.
